name: bit labyrinthe
description:
Go to the 1 Bit Jam

This is a game made for the game jam "1 Bit Jam" by Daniel Linssen. https://itch.io/jam/bit-jam Intro : My game is a simple labyrinth, "labyrinthe" in french. There is three level. The first two are easy. But the third is a bit more difficult. :) Main : To understand the game you have to see the labyrinth from above. You move a pawn. Moves are done tile by tile. If the screen switch once and slowly you moved your pawn. If you bump against a wall the screen will flash quickly. Hint : Draw a map of your moves. Tutorial : To reach the end of the first level, you only need two moves. Down, left and yay ! ########### # start # # here # # # ##########---------# # | # # end | # # | # #################### Now try to reach the end of the game ! :) Outro : Made with Game Maker Studio Free by @moanatari. moanatari [at] gmail [dot] com twitter.com/moanatari
